nodes.bodyText: Here clearDbObjects is incorrect because destroy == false. IMHO valid value for flag is false.

It seems this place (and below at line 1041) are only places where we should remove metric configuration. IF this code will be invoked from this place then we don't need any additional flags for GridCacheAdapter.stop() method.
We can avoid this change. See my comment to GridCacheProcessor.stopCache() method.
Could be just removed (condition and statement under it). See my comment to GridCacheProcessor.stopCache() method.
After cache destroying should be asserted that metric configuration is removed.
